title: ColourFood
caption: A diet of vegetables and fruit of different colours will bring you nutritional benefits, maintaining the genetic diversity in food production.

title: Sounds like a plan
caption: Before buying groceries try to plan your meals for the entire week. You will be able to buy the right amount of food avoiding any waste.

title: The Walking Health
caption: Include walking in your daily routine! Once a day try to go out and walk for 30 minutes: it helps you stay physically and mentally healthy.

title: Listen to yourself
caption: Everyday spend 30 minutes for yourself: read a good book, try some yoga, have a walk with some good music. You’ll feel much better!

title: OOOOM
caption: Take at least 10 minutes to meditate. Meditation will help you to understand yourself and your emotions while exploring the secrets of the mind.

title: The Health Runner
caption: Running can significantly improve physical and mental health: try running for 30 minutes at least once a week.

title: The Health Runner 2
caption: Running can significantly improve physical and mental health, try running for 30 minutes every day.

title: Help!/I'm down
caption: We all sometimes get overwhelmed by our feelings when things go wrong. If you feel you can't cope with it, ask for help from a friend or an expert.

title: Reduce Lilac Wine
caption: Drink less than 30cl of pure alcohol in one day and have at least two alcohol-free days a week. Avoid it during tough times: it never solves problems.

title: I'll be there for You
caption: Spend an afternoon with friends. Friendship is related to better mental and physical health: it reduces stress levels and inspires positive attitudes.

title: Follow your heart
caption: Do something you are good at, like playing an instrument. Enjoying yourself helps to beat stress, and achieving new goals increases self-esteem.

title: Read 2 books
caption: Read, just for the pleasure of learning and knowing. Good education starts from you: get a book, learn from it, share your knowledge with passion.

title: Sustainable shower
caption: We waste a lot of water singing in the shower! Set a timer and be sure to spend less than 5 minutes under the water.

title: Have a Gramps time!
caption: Spend some time with your grandparents, they can give you amazing tips on how to live life and can give you help on how to approach problems!

title: Search for quality
caption: Don’t buy the first thing that appears under your eyes! Go to buy groceries, but search for the quality, remember cheaper equals to more noxious!

title: Clean the economy
caption: Support a fairer and more inclusive economy by discouraging works that are not taxed or controlled by any form of government and by paying taxes.

title: Find & Fund
caption: Find a worthy project on the internet and fund it. Start-ups are one of the most remarkable players in R&D and economic growth.

title: MagazInternet
caption: Read your favourite magazines on the internet! Same information and images: the only difference is the environmental impact.

title: Recycling collection
caption: Ask your school or workplace to start sorting and putting all the different bins for each type of rubbish!

title: Unplug it!
caption: When you are not using your electrical appliances, do not put them in stand-by mode, but switch them off: this way you won’t waste energy!

title: Flora et Labora
caption: Become a sustainable food producer by growing your food. You will be able to control the growing environment and consume fresher and healthier meals.

title: Moka? What else?
caption: Start making coffee with a moka pot instead of using a coffee maker. This way you won’t have to buy single-use coffee pods anymore.

title: Eat meat twice a week
caption: The meat production system is broken, but you can help to fix it: just try to reduce your meat consumption.

title: Just eat it!
caption: Food wasting is causing climate change, and every day millions suffer from starvation: buy and cook only what you eat and freeze leftovers.

title: You aren't Iron-man
caption: Sometimes your clothes can be wrinkle-free even if you don't iron them: pull them a little and they will be ready to wear.

title: A+++
caption: When you have to buy a new electronic device, look for the letter A on the label, which means low consumption. The more +, the better!

title: Not great landscapes
caption: Put each food in a defined place in your refrigerator and freezer, so when you need it, you don't have to admire the inside by holding the door open.

title: Change your bulbs
caption: Buy LED bulbs: they have a longer life and the same light, you spend up to 90% less on your electricity bill.

title: Go Cycling
caption: The bike is an excellent alternative to cars and other not eco-friendly means of transport. Furthermore, it is better for your health too.

title: Love is not for sale
caption: Before buying a pet try to consider adoption, lots of dropped animals are waiting for you, it's free and the pet will thank you with all its love!

title: Game changer
caption: Get organised with friends and go around the city to pick up trash and clean your environment. Focus on parks, woods or beaches. Turn it into a game!

title: Every book is a book
caption: Buy books in ebook or used version: they are cheaper and more ecological. Do it with school’s books too: less price, more notes. What could be better?

title: Come on, speak up!
caption: One of your personal rights is the chance to vote, don’t stand a part in front of an election, fight for your ideas and express your opinion!

title: S-Cream?
caption: Don't buy cosmetics tested on animals. Cruelty-free products are more sustainable, reliable and are better for your health too.

title: By opposing end them
caption: If you see a bad action, don’t stand still, oppose yourself against that. Only in this way you can make the world a better place without villains.

title: Stand by me
caption: Help people that need assistance! If you see an old person, a pregnant lady or a person with disabilities on the bus give them your place!

title: The Big Bag Theory
caption: If you want to waste less, buy big packages of everything instead of lots of small ones!

title: Recharge in charge
caption: Using rechargeable batteries instead of disposable ones is good not only for the environment but also for your wallet!

title: Green period
caption: Try using sustainable alternatives instead of the classic tampon such as washable tampons or, if you want to try something different, menstrual cups.

title: One week, one fish!
caption: Eating fish is very healthy: once a week, buy it at the local market. To preserve biodiversity be sure to buy a different type of fish each time!

title: Clear water dream
caption: Spend an afternoon cleaning a river, lake or beach near your home to make it a better place for you and your whole community.

title: Water 1, Plastic 0
caption: Stop buying bottled water: plastic is toxic to the environment! Try new methods: boil it, filter it, use chlorine or rainwater.

title: Post-it? No!
caption: Instead of using Post-its, download an app that reminds you of all your stuff: you will have it at your fingertips while saving a lot of trees.

title: Mail? Why not email?
caption: Stop using postal services. Switch to online communications, such as e-mail or instant messages. Discourage paper advertising too.

title: Avoid printing
caption: When required, print on both sides, monochrome, on recycled paper, checking the content and reducing the font size and margins.

title: Personal rights 1
caption: Do you really know everything about your job? Find out which are your rights at work to be safe on every occasion and to resolve problems faster!

title: Personal rights 2
caption: Check that your workplace has adequate health and safety measures and complain if they are not in place. Look for safety regulations on the internet.

title: Make a Com-Post
caption: Composting food scraps can reduce climate impact while also saving nutrients and reducing the need for chemical fertilizers

title: Note: take digital notes!
caption: Buying local and in-season food helps to increase the productivity and incomes of small food producers and to reduce pollution caused by transports

title: You snooze, you cool
caption: Sleep 7.5-9 hours a night. Longer and better sleep positively affects the emotional centres of our brain and improves the immune system and memory.
